name: North American Wetlands Conservation Fund
objective: To provide grant funds for wetlands conservation projects in the United States, Canada, and Mexico.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: North American Wetlands Conservation Act, 16 U.S.C. §4401 et seq.

rules_regulations: U.S. Standard Grants Application Instructions; Small Grant Instructions; Mexico Standard Grants Application Instructions provided in English and Spanish; Canada Standard Grants Application Instructions; U.S. Grant Administration Standards; 2 CFR 200.
